name: DRUGULA
description:
DRUGULA

a game about being a drug addicted vampire. 
inspired by electric wizard

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

X to suck

C to jump

V to attack

Programming/Design: Ruan Rothmann @rrza

Art: Jarred Lunt @thejunt

Music: Tim Harbour @jumpshipmusic

Additional Animation: Marcelle Marais
